description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noor alam Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks: from n/a through 1.2.38.

product.name: Magical Posts Display – Elementor & Gutenberg Posts Blocks
